replies.body:
Hi resepignev!

How are you?
So far, on the Forums, on the server, maybe on TeamSpeak, you are an AWESOME moderator!
Thank you for all the contribution you have done so far!
It is really great to have you on Avicus.
Anyways..let's get to the questions!

1. What is your real name?
2. How tall are you?
3. What is your favorite drink?
4. When did you become a moderator?
5. Why did you use my format for the PacerTest AMA? (I am not mad)
6. Who is your favorite staff member?
7. What is your favorite movie?
8. What are your opinions on me?
9. What are your opinions on South Korea and Greece?
10. What languages can you speak?

Please answer them, and calm my curiosity down!
Thank you!
Also, please continue to be a cool, and humorous moderator!
See you in game!

P.S- I hope we can talk sometime on TeamSpeak. xD

replies.body:
Hey Flo! You've always been a great friend and I can always count on you. From us being partners in the staff UHC to helping me with HTML. Keep up the great work as mod! Questions...

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
  2. What is your favourite thing to spend money on?
  3. What do you use more often, the dictionary or thesaurus?
  4. Why?
  5. Do you believe honesty is the best policy?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. Which of the four seasons do you most love? Or hate?
  8. What was your first impression of me?
Have a great summer! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

replies.body:
Hi Ateh,

I'm fine, you?
Thanks that's nize to hear :D

Florian or short Flo.
around 1,87m.
icetea!
around a year ago, May 23th 2015 to be exact.
I don't really know, it looked good and i just used it :D
Cyanide and john and Zero.
Castle in the sky.
Cool gurl, sometimes a bit too hyped, but okay :D
South Korea is like a painting with colors splattered everywhere and coated in weird candies. Greece is not the best country (can't pay their stuff), but you can have a nize vacation there.
English and German.

See ya ingame and if you are on TS just poke me :D

replies.body: Me and impersonating staff? NOOOO NEVER!!!

replies.body: Whales are the kitties of the ocean!
replies.body_tagged: Whales are the kitties of the ocean!

replies.body:
You are a great friend as well <3 OMFG the staff UHC was hilarious xD

1. http://i.imgur.com/fZvuj1x.jpg (A friend of me)
2. Food, I spent like 50 bucks on food each month...
3. Dictionary
4. For translating words I forgot xD
5. Policy 1.1 - General Principles, which should be common sense, but yea ...
6. EDM, mostly House.
7. Summer, because it's hot and you can go swimming, cycling and if it's too hot you can chill inside xD
8. I feared you a bit because of the sr mod rank, but now you are a great friend, because I got to know you better :D

Have a great summer as well and take it easy too <3
